result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Damien J. Worth

records.addlTxt:
2:47 PM Defendant Damien J. Worth in court.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Damien J. Worth.  Attorney Mitchell Philbin in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Atty provides plea form.
ADA heard on agreement.
Court heard on agreement and requests clarification on reasons for State's agreement.
Atty Hansen heard on agreement that was made with DA.
Court arraigns Deft on Count 1.
Deft enters a plea of no contest.
Non-citizen advisory.
No firearms.
May not vote or serve on jury until civil rights are restored.
PleaQuest/WOR.
Constitutional rights.
Read-ins.
Deft understands.
Elements of offense.
Atty Hansen satisfied.
Factual basis.
Court finds Deft enters plea freely, voluntarily and intelligently; therefore court accepts plea and finds Deft guilty to Count 1.
Court dismisses and reads-in Count 2.
Court orders presentence investigation be completed.  
Agent to provide report to court at least 2 weeks prior to sentencing. 
3:05 off record.
3:07 back on record.
Court schedules with parties.
Court orders deft to go to the DOC office today to schedule the PSI.
Court orders Deft to cooperate with the PSI process.
3:08 PM
Sentencing hearing scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

3:19 PM Prosecuting attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Damien J. Worth in court.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Damien J. Worth. 
Copy of Info file 7-5-22.
Atty Hansen - waives reading, enters n/g pleas, requests STC.
Court schedules STC w/parties.
3:21 pm
Status conference scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

3:13 PM 
Prosecuting attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Damien J. Worth in court.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Damien J. Worth. 
Prelim quest/WOR provided
Def waives prelim
Court finds def freely waives prelim
Def bound over for trial 
3:15PM
Arraignment scheduled for July 6, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

2:06 PM Defendant Damien J. Worth in court.  Attorney robert James mraz in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Court inquires on atty.
Deft to talk to PD rep.
2:07 PM
2:24 back on record.
Atty Hansen is present and is heard.
Deft qualifies for PD rep.
Has discussed complaint with deft.
Deft understands charges and penalties.
Waives formal reading.
Requests prelim.
Deft waives time limits.
Court schedules.
ADA heard on bond recommendation.
Atty Hansen heard on bond.
Court imposes $2500 signature bond w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances illegal in WI today and including THC without a valid Rx, no operating a motor vehicle, no contact with victim.
2:31 PM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
